

1. Load library:

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
```

2. Load data:

```{r, message = FALSE}
data <- read.csv(file = "data/bt_canonical_imm_genes_under_selection.txt",
                   header = TRUE)
table(data$chr)
```

3. Check how many have significant signatures of selection:

```{r, message = FALSE}
## Check how many are single copy orthologues:
table(data$singleCopyOrthl)

## Check how many are significant?
genes_under_selection <- subset(x = data,
            selectionPval < 0.05)
```

3. Read in immune genes:

```{r, message = FALSE}
immune_genes <- scan(file = "data/gene_lists/barribeau_2015_gene_symbols.txt",
                     as.character())

immune_genes_under_selection <- subset(genes_under_selection,
       geneID %in% immune_genes)
```
